      public void setUserUid()
      A method that sets the userUid field to the UID of the currently signed-in user. Use this method after the user has successfully signed in.

    • anonymousSignIn

      public void anonymousSignIn(Database.SignInCallBack callBack)
      A method that signs in a user anonymously using Firebase Auth/ If the sign-in is successful, a new user is added to the databse with the user's unique ID. If it fails, log it
      Parameters:
      callBack - is an instance of SignInCallBack which used to handle the result of the sign-in operation.

    • getUserDocument

      public void getUserDocument(String uid, Database.OnUserDocumentRetrievedListener listener)
      Retrieves a user document from the "user" collection in Firestore using the document uid. If the document exists, it is converted into a Users object and the `onUserDocumentRetrieved` method of the provided listener is called with the Users object. If the document doesn't exist, log it If an error occurs during the document retrieval,log it.
      Parameters:
      uid - is the user id of the document ot retrieve
      listener - is an instance of OnUserDocumentRetrievedListener which is used to handle the result of the document retrieval.

    • storeImageUri

      public void storeImageUri(String uid, String imageUri, String imageType)
      Store an image URI in a firestore document based on user id and image type If the image type is "uploadedImage", the image URI is stored under the "uploadedImage" field. If the image type is "autoGenImage", the image URI is stored under the "autoGenImage" field. else nothing
      Parameters:
      uid - is the user ID of the document to store the image URI in.
      imageUri - is the URI of the image to store.
      imageType - is the type of the image, either 'uploadedImage' or 'autoGenImage'

    • addEvent

      public void addEvent(Event event, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<Void> onCompleteListener)
      Adds an event to the Firebase Firestore database. This method creates a map of event details and stores it under a document identified by the event's ID.
      Parameters:
      event - The event object containing the details of the event.
      onCompleteListener - A listener that is called upon the completion of the event addition process.

    • deleteEvent

      public void deleteEvent(String eventId, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<Void> onCompleteListener)
      Adds an event to the Firebase Firestore database. This method creates a map of event details and stores it under a document identified by the event's ID.
      Parameters:
      event - The event object containing the details of the event.
      onCompleteListener - A listener that is called upon the completion of the event addition process.

    • deleteQrEventPoster

      public void deleteQrEventPoster(String checkInUri, String eventUri, String eventPoster)
      Adds an event to the Firebase Firestore database. This method creates a map of event details and stores it under a document identified by the event's ID.
      Parameters:
      checkInUri - The event object containing the details of the event.
      eventUri - The URI of the event poster image.
      eventPoster - The URI of the event poster image.

    • deleteImageFromStorage

      public void deleteImageFromStorage(Image image, Database.OnImageDeletedListener listener)
      Adds an event to the Firebase Firestore database. This method creates a map of event details and stores it under a document identified by the event's ID.
      Parameters:
      image - The event object containing the details of the event.
      onCompleteListener - A listener that is called upon the completion of the event addition process.

    • getEventsByOrganizer

      public void getEventsByOrganizer(String organizerId, Database.OnEventsRetrievedListener listener)
      Retrieves a list of events organized by a specific user from the Firestore database. This method queries the Firestore database for events where the 'organizerId' matches the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      organizerId - The unique ID of the organizer whose events are to be retrieved.
      listener - A listener that is called when events are successfully retrieved.

    • getEventsForOrganizerMilestoneCompletion

      public void getEventsForOrganizerMilestoneCompletion(String organizerId, Database.OnEventsRetrievedListener listener)
      Fetches events of users whose milestones have been complete
      Parameters:
      organizerId - the user who wants to check if their milestones have been complete
      listener - the receiver

    • getEventById

      public void getEventById(String eventId, Database.EventCallBack callBack)
      Fetches a single event from the Firestore database using the event ID.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique ID of the event to fetch.
      callBack - The callback that will handle the event once it is fetched.

      public void fetchImages(@Nullable String pageToken, Database.OnImageRetrievedListener listener)
      This method retreives all the events available on the database
      Parameters:
      pageToken -
      listener -

    • addSignin

      public void addSignin(String eventId, String newAttendeeId)
      Registers a new attendee for a specific event. If the event already has a list of attendees, the new attendee is added to this list. If the attendee is already registered, no changes are made. If the event does not have any attendees yet, a new list is created with the attendee in it.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier of the event for which to register the attendee.
      newAttendeeId - The unique identifier of the attendee to register.

    • getSignedAttendees

      public void getSignedAttendees(String eventId, Database.OnSignedAttendeesRetrievedListener listener)
      This method is to retrieve the array list once we pass the event id
      Parameters:
      eventId -
      listener -

    • getEventByCheckInID

      public void getEventByCheckInID(String QRCheckinID, Database.EventCallBack callBack)
      Fetches a single event from the Firestore database using the check-in QR ID. If the event is found, the provided Database.EventCallBack is invoked with the retrieved event.
      Parameters:
      QRCheckinID - The ID of the check-in QR code.
      callBack - The callback that will handle the event once it is fetched.

    • getSignedUpEvents

      public void getSignedUpEvents(String userId, Database.OnEventsRetrievedListener listener)
      Fetches a single event from the Firestore database using the check-in QR ID. If the event is found, the provided Database.EventCallBack is invoked with the retrieved event.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the check-in QR code.
      listener - The callback that will handle the event once it is fetched.

    • getCheckedInEvents

      public void getCheckedInEvents(String userId, Database.OnEventsRetrievedListener listener)
      This method retreives checked in eventsa when a uid is passed onto it
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID which basically checks events it is in
      listener - returns the array

      public void checkUserInEvent(String userUid, String eventId, Database.CheckUserInEventCallback callback)
      THIS CHECKS IF user id is in event
      Parameters:
      userUid - user id we are checking
      eventId - event id we are searching
      callback - returns boolean

    • updateEventAttendees

      public void updateEventAttendees(String eventID, ArrayList<String> attendees)
      Method to update an event's attendee's list.
      Parameters:
      eventID - The event that's meant to be updated.
      attendees - A 2D ArrayList containing the attendees and the number of times they have checked in.

    • updatecurrentAttendance

      public void updatecurrentAttendance(String eventId, Integer currentAttendance)
      Method to update an event's attendee's list.
      Parameters:
      eventID - The event that's meant to be updated.
      attendees - A 2D ArrayList containing the attendees and the number of times they have checked in.

    • updateEventCheckInLocations

      public void updateEventCheckInLocations(String eventID, ArrayList<String> checkInLocations)
      Method to update an event's list of where attendees are checking in from.
      Parameters:
      eventID - The event that's meant to be updated.
      checkInLocations - A 2D ArrayList containing the locations that attendees checked in from.

    • storeNotification

      public void storeNotification(String message, String eventId)
      Method to update an event's list of where attendees are checking in from.
      Parameters:
      message - The event that's meant to be updated.
      eventId - A 2D ArrayList containing the locations that attendees checked in from.

    • getNotificationsForEvent

      public void getNotificationsForEvent(String eventId, Database.OnNotificationsRetrievedListener listener)
      Retrieves a list of notification messages for a specific event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique ID of the event for which to retrieve the notifications.
      listener - A listener that is called when the notifications are successfully retrieved.
